00042 bool ReactiveNavigationDemoApp::OnInit()
00043 {
00044         // Starting in wxWidgets 2.9.0, we must reset numerics locale to "C",
00045         //  if we want numbers to use "." in all countries. The App::OnInit() is a perfect place to undo
00046         //  the default wxWidgets settings. (JL @ Sep-2009)
00047         wxSetlocale(LC_NUMERIC,wxString(wxT("C")));
00048 
00049         //(*AppInitialize
00050     bool wxsOK = true;
00051     wxInitAllImageHandlers();
00052     if ( wxsOK )
00053     {
00054         ReactiveNavigationDemoFrame* Frame = new ReactiveNavigationDemoFrame(0);
00055         Frame->Show();
00056         SetTopWindow(Frame);
00057     }
00058     //*)
00059     return wxsOK;
00060 
00061 }
